long_description: From sweeping prairie grasslands to the towering Monument Rocks, the DeLorme Kansas Atlas and Gazetteer covers the entire Sunflower State in fine detail. Covers wilderness areas, unique natural features, bicycle routes, campgrounds, hiking, gardens and fishing areas. Also includes back roads, museums, golf courses, historic sites, scenic drives and biking areas. Each of the 65 quadrangular maps covers approximately 24 mi. east/west by 33.5 mi. north/south; scale is 1:200,000; one in. represents approximately 3.2 mi. Features tips on how to estimate your mileage on a road trip, how to use a GPS with the atlas and how to orient the maps with a compass. Detailed atlas index, listed alphabetically with map page and grid coordinates, helps locate points of interest easily. GPS-compatible maps contain Lat./Lon. tick marks and grid lines using the standard WGS84 datum. Latitude spacing is at 7-minute-and-15-second intervals while longitude is at 8-minute intervals. DeLorme copyright 2009; 80 pages.
short_description: From sweeping prairie grasslands to the towering Monument Rocks, the DeLorme Kansas Atlas and Gazetteer covers the entire Sunflower State in fine detail.
